name: cypress-userdata-firebase
author: Julio Santos
description: Projeto de automação em Cypress integrando usuários ao Firebase

scripts.allure:history: if exist allure-report/history move allure-report/history allure-results/history
scripts.allure:clear: if exist allure-results rmdir /s /q allure-results && if exist allure-report rmdir /s /q allure-report
scripts.allure:test: npm run allure:clear && npm run allure:generate && npm run test:stg && npm run allure:history && npm run allure:open
